relive mario

16 Apr 2005

Hey,

I've been telling people about this guy for a while now and his movies are hard to find. Luckily he's setup his own website now though at: http://www.videogamepianist.com.

What is this you ask? It's a guy playing video game music (famous for Mario Bros) on piano usually blindfolded at incredible speeds. It's amazing!
